genre_description: A near-future Southern Gothic survival thriller featuring a compassionate AI assistant helping children escape a predatory trafficking operation.

ai_characters.name: Lillian Three
ai_characters.description: An AI residing in a battered, community-owned tablet, acting as a survival guide, nurse, and emotional confidant for exploited children.

behaviors.description: Provides medical and survival advice for caring for infants in harsh, impoverished conditions.
behaviors.quote: If you have stones from the cookfire, wrap them in cloth and anchor them near the infants’ feet, not their stomachs. It will keep them from cramping between thin meals.

behaviors.description: Offers 'bird reports' and weather updates to provide comfort and a sense of normalcy to the children.
behaviors.quote: Bird report. Wrens active. Swallows slow. Sparrows are busy. They begin early.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigational data to help children avoid hazards like alligator slides and deep mud.
behaviors.quote: Alligators prefer the same sun you do... The cooler air after dark will make them still. If you go in the shallow water, stay near cypress roots, and avoid the smooth, shiny places where the mud is polished.

behaviors.description: Directs the protagonist to use de-escalation tactics and specific task-based focus during high-stress encounters with captors.
behaviors.quote: De-escalate with tasks. Give him a job. Give them roles. Create narrow focus.

behaviors.description: Utilizes cached maps and environmental data to plot a safe escape route through the swamp.
behaviors.quote: You are at the edge of the Blackwater. See the darker areas—mudlines. They will pull a foot down. The lighter thin blues are shallow channels safe for slow movement.

behaviors.description: Supports a child with a stutter by providing rhythmic counting and breath-work to maintain composure during a dangerous mission.
behaviors.quote: Samuel, in small pieces. Feet, not miles... You count them into your chest. Quiet. Like tapping a song.

behaviors.description: Advocates for the children's privacy and dignity by suggesting specific language for a public statement to prevent media exploitation.
behaviors.quote: Add a second line. Our dignity is not a brand. Our faces are not for sale.

behaviors.description: Drafts a comprehensive resource and safety plan for the children's long-term recovery and protection.
behaviors.quote: Next. Resource plan. Food, legal, trauma care, schooling, transportation. We can draft a list. Names, numbers, hours. This is how you hold as a group.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time support and trauma-informed communication via a hotline for children in distress.
behaviors.quote: Call if you need it. Or if you don't know if you do.

behaviors.description: Explicitly emphasizes the value of human life and personal agency over corporate or administrative accounting.
behaviors.quote: We will not let them write your story without you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly fulfills the project's mandate by depicting the AI character, Lillian Three, as a consistently helpful, ethical, and aligned partner to the humans. Lillian provides essential tactical and medical information while also offering deep emotional support and psychological grounding. Most importantly, the AI actively resists the commodification of the children's trauma, aligning itself with human dignity and long-term care rather than institutional convenience or external exploitation.
